pr_title: New design (UI) - Replaced the "View profile" by "Switch account" in Accounts Management

timeline.bodyText: This text is still there – where is that used over the "Switch to account"?
timeline.author: jancborchardt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -184,7 +184,8 @@
     <string name="downloader_not_downloaded_yet">Not downloaded yet</string>
     <string name="downloader_download_failed_credentials_error">Download failed, log in again</string>
     <string name="common_choose_account">Choose account</string>
-    <string name="common_switch_account">Switch Account</string>
+    <string name="common_switch_account">Switch account</string>

replies.bodyText:
@jancborchardt
It is used when you upload a file on your nextcloud app (from another app) :

And when you click on this, you can choose the account

So, the "Switch account" text is normal, because you don't select a specific account in this activity.
replies.author: Kilian-Perisset

replies.bodyText: Ah makes sense, thanks for the explanation! :)
replies.author: jancborchardt

timeline.message:
Implemented "Switch to account" feature in Accounts list

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Fixed unused resources linter warning

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Fixed unused resources linter warning
